name: Browsers
description: A package which installs various browsers.

chromeVersion.description: The version of the Chrome to install.

useChromeForTesting.description: A flag to indicate if the Chrome for Testing or the default chrome should be used.

chromeTestingVersionsUrl.description: Override Chrome for Testing versions URL.

firefoxVersion.description: The version of the Firefox to install.

firefoxVersionResolve.description: If true, resolves partial Firefox versions (e.g. 142.0) to the highest available patch version (e.g. 142.0.3).
